mapper.sql: SELECT /* stUserFvtInfo.getUserFavoriteMenuListBase */ FVT.RT_TGT_SEQ , TGT.RT_TGT_NM , FVT.SORT_SEQ , TO_CHAR(FVT.SYS_MOD_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM , FVT.USE_YN FROM ST_USER_FVT_INFO FVT , ST_RT_TGT_BASE TGT -- 권한대상기본 , ST_USER_BASE SUB -- 사용자기본 WHERE FVT.RT_TGT_SEQ = TGT.RT_TGT_SEQ AND TGT.USE_YN = 'Y' AND FVT.USER_ID = SUB.USER_ID AND ( SELECT INFO.USE_YN FROM ST_RT_INFO INFO WHERE SUB.RT_GRP_NO = INFO.RT_GRP_NO AND INFO.RT_TGT_SEQ = FVT.RT_TGT_SEQ ) = 'Y' AND FVT.USER_ID = #{userId} AND RT_TGT_NM LIKE #{rtTgtNm} || '%' ORDER BY FVT.SORT_SEQ
mapper.select: SELECT /* stUserFvtInfo.getFvtMenuList */ FVT.RT_TGT_SEQ , TGT.RT_TGT_NM , TGT.UPR_RT_TGT_SEQ , TGT.CALL_URL , FVT.SORT_SEQ , FVT.USE_YN FROM ST_USER_FVT_INFO FVT , ST_RT_TGT_BASE TGT -- 권한대상기본 , ST_USER_BASE SUB -- 사용자기본 WHERE FVT.RT_TGT_SEQ = TGT.RT_TGT_SEQ AND FVT.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TGT.USE_YN = 'Y' AND FVT.USER_ID = SUB.USER_ID AND ( SELECT INFO.USE_YN FROM ST_RT_INFO INFO WHERE SUB.RT_GRP_NO = INFO.RT_GRP_NO AND INFO.RT_TGT_SEQ = FVT.RT_TGT_SEQ ) = 'Y' AND FVT.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY FVT.SORT_SEQ, FVT.RT_TGT_SEQ
